articles.author: Martin Coulter
articles.title: Apple files legal challenge to EU's Digital Markets Act - Reuters
articles.description: Apple (AAPL.O) has filed a legal case contesting decisions taken by the European Commission under its recently-introduced Digital Markets Act, according to a post shared by the Cou…
articles.content: LONDON, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Apple (AAPL.O) has filed a legal case contesting decisions taken by the European Commission under its recently-introduced Digital Markets Act, according to a post shared by… [+1462 chars]
